nodes.description: Idit Fried和她的丈夫Andre在2002年3月27日于Netanya的Park Hotel参加了Passover节日大餐
nodes.support_text: Idit Fried和她的丈夫Andre在2002年3月27日于Netanya的Park Hotel参加了Passover节日大餐

nodes.description: 一名恐怖分子在Passover节日大餐期间进入Park Hotel的餐厅并引爆了爆炸装置
nodes.support_text: 一名恐怖分子在Passover节日大餐期间进入Park Hotel的餐厅并引爆了爆炸装置

nodes.description: 爆炸立即导致22人死亡，140人受伤，其中8人在随后死亡
nodes.support_text: 爆炸立即导致22人死亡，140人受伤，其中8人在随后死亡

nodes.description: Idit Fried的孩子们到达Laniado医院寻找他们的父母，让医院的工作人员感到悲痛

nodes.description: Idit Fried被埋葬在Netanya，她的母亲、女儿Shirli和儿子Tom幸存

nodes.description: 爆炸者是哈马斯伊扎丁·卡萨姆旅的成员，来自西岸的图尔卡雷姆市
nodes.support_text: The bomber was identified as a member of the Hamas Iz a Din al-Kassam Brigades, from the West Bank city of Tulkarem

nodes.description: 爆炸者是在以色列要求逮捕的恐怖分子名单上
nodes.support_text: He was on the list of wanted terrorists Israel had requested be arrested

nodes.description: Idit Fried一家在Park Hotel庆祝Passover的传统
nodes.support_text: During the last few years, they celebrated the Passover seder at the Park Hotel, a short walk from their home in Netanya.

nodes.description: Idit Fried一家计划今年与Andre's mother和step-father, Idit's mother, and their two children一起庆祝Passover
nodes.support_text: This year they were to celebrate together with Andre's mother and step-father, Idit's mother, and their two children.
